@field: question_text
Look at the diagram below and answer the question.

![Test Diagram](test_image.png)

What color is the pixel?
@end_field

@field: options
A. Blue
B. Red*
C. Green
D. Yellow
@end_field

@field: answer
B
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback
This is a test image for RFC-012 verification.

![Feedback Image](feedback_image.png)
@@end_field

@@field: correct_feedback

@@end_field

@@field: incorrect_feedback
